message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today. I think it would be perfect for your needs. I'm asking for $15,000 for it. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the opportunity to purchase your product, but my budget is limited. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $10,000?
Hi Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $10,000 is too low for me.  Could you meet me halfway at $12,500?

Hello Alice, thank you for your follow-up offer. While I understand the value of your product, I am still unable to meet you at $12,500. Would it be possible for us to negotiate closer to my budget of $10,000?
